name: Lily Protector
description:
Worry no more that a misclick might result in selling your precious plant.

Hides the Go buttons on the cards which do so.

Cards only available at levels 1-5 not yet supported.
additional_info:
This style is not supported by FBG. Please contact me first if you encounter any problems.

To speed development, many branch ids have been provided by other players, see http://community.failbettergames.com/topic20311-user-style-lily-protector-incomplete.aspx for more information or to help with missing branches.

0.3 Adds level 6, thanks Kaigen!
0.2 Adds level 16, thanks Ysrthgrathe! Internal changes
0.1 Initial release, Level 12 only
